{{Actor| | type = Quest item | name = Money | class = Gold25 | game = Strife | doomednum = 139 | convid = 170, 163, 167 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:Coin|Coin]]→Gold25
A purse of coins worth 25 gold. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Gold25 : {{Class|Coin}} { {{Property|Inventory.Amount}} 25 {{Property|Tag}} "$TAG_25GOLD" // "25 gold" {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$TXT_25GOLD" // "You picked up 25 gold." States { Spawn: SACK A -1 Stop } }
